game.shortDescription: South Park 제작자인 트레이 파커와 맷 스톤이 South Park: The Fractured but Whole을 선보입니다. 2014년 수상 경력에 빛나는 South Park: The Stick of Truth의 속편이죠.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the creators of South Park, Trey Parker and Matt Stone, comes South Park: The Fractured But Whole, a sequel to 2014's award-winning South Park: The Stick of Truth.

reviewHighlights.text: Probably the greatest cartoon RPG of all time. Wouldn't know because Ubi's DRM keeps crashing so I can't actually play the game I paid for.
